subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Talks to settle the N.H.L. lockout slowed to a crawl Friday, as the league and players’ union held bargaining talks at two separate locations, with a mediator shuffling between the two sides.
snippet: Talks to settle the N.H.L. lockout slowed to a crawl Friday, as the league and players’ union held bargaining talks at two separate locations, with a mediator shuffling between the two sides.
